name: Fluctuating Entropic Regulator
description:
A component used inside advanced Triglavian technology such as Extraction SubNodes to shape and direct zero-point energy, the inner workings of the Entropic Regulator continue to baffle the scientists of K-space. 

This regulator has been damaged causing it to become unstable, but the nature of that instability could help to unlock the secrets of advanced zero-point energy manipulation - making this an extremely valuable item.
